official-title.#text:
To prohibit the use of funds appropriated to any Federal department or agency to provide technical
			 assistance to nongovernment entities for the production of motion
			 pictures, television shows, and other audiovisual programs.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

text.#text:
No Federal department or agency may obligate or expend funds appropriated to the department or
			 agency for a fiscal year to provide technical assistance to any
			 nongovernment entity for the production of any motion picture, television
			 show, documentary, music videos, commercial advertisement, CD–ROM game, or
			 other audiovisual program.

header.#text:
Prohibition on use of Federal funds to provide technical assistance for motion pictures, television
			 shows, and other audiovisual programs

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4072 IH: To prohibit the use of funds appropriated to any Federal department or agency to provide technical assistance to nongovernment entities for the production of motion pictures, television shows, and other audiovisual programs.
